elawalu ha palathuru asurum kirime nithiya sambandhayen wirodhatha dakwana kisiwaku ee gana sakachcha kirimata illimak kara nathi bawa da heli wi thibe.samupakara ha abhyanthara welenda katayuthu amathi jonstan pranandu mahatha eeye parlimenthuwe di prakashayak karamin kiya sitiye elawalu ha palathuru prawahanaye di plastik kuda bhawithayata ganima mangin gowinta kisindu balapamak sidu nowana bawa yi.aarthika madhyasthana wetha athtraktar, thriroda ratha, yathuru padi, kuda lori mangin elawalu ha palathuru prawahanaya kirime di da plastik kuda bhawithaya aniwarya kara nathi bawa da amathiwaraya kiya.elawalu ha palathuru asurum kirime nithiya sambandhayen wirodhatha dakwana kisiwaku methek ee gana sakachcha kirimata illimak kara nathi bawath pranandu mahatha eeye (13) parlimenthuwe di prakasha kaleya.elawalu ha palathuru asurum kirime nithiyata erehiwa ella wi athi wirodhaya wenuwen rajaye sthawaraya pahadili karana lesa wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha kala prakashayakata prathichara dakwana amathiwaraya, me sambandhayen oonama keneku samanga sakachcha kirimata sudanam bawa kiya.mehi di thawaduratath karunu dak wu jonstan pranandu mahatha wasara hayak pura sidu kala wimarshanayakata anuwa elawalu ha palathuru plastik kuda wala prawahanaya kirima aniwarya kala bawa pawasi ya.meya itha honda wadak bawa wipaksha nayaka ha sunil handunneththi mahatha da piligena thibune yayi da hethema kiya.amathiwaraya mese da kiya.

2009 wasaredi thrasthawadayata erehiwa yayi pawasunu natakaya sarthakawa ragadakwimata shiralanka rajaya samathwuna.namuth mewara prekshakaya pera men moda naha.shiralanka rajaye prajathanthrawadi nowana kirayakarakam mewara nam jathyanthara prajawage awadhanayata lakwanu athayi apa balaporoththuwen sitinne.damila eelam rajyayak sadaha wana bahujathika rajaya samulaghathanayanta wagakiwa yuthu yudha aparadhakaruwange nam layisthuwak idiriyedi nikuth kirimata sitinawa.apa ema layisthuwa lowa siyalu ratawala rajayan wetha laba di eewaye nam sadahan pudgalayinta wenath ratawalata athulwima thahanam karana lesatath kisiyam wides rataka owunge wathkam ha depala athnam eewa ema ratehi rajaya wetha pawaraganna lesath illa sitimata apa salasum kara thikhenawa.apage me wadakatayuthu wala sakas kara thikhenne eksath jathinge aarakshaka kawunsila 1373 sabhawarayedi sammatha karagath thrastha wirodhi kamituwe kriyakarithwaya anusarayenuyi.
